amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Organic Data Initiative by $300,000 offset by a reduction in the account for Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments of $342,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Agricultural Marketing Service by $300,000 and reduce the account for Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments by $342,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 352 - 70 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 352 - 70 (Roll no. 422).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Farr.
